name: KhlorisCoin
description:
The purpose of Khloris Coin is to support people, institutions, causes and projects, human and environment which help in some way to build a better world.

â€‹

KhlorisCoin is a deflationary token on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) that is auto liquidity generating with static rewards on every transaction for all holders. There is a 10% fee on transactions split between the existing holders and the Liquidity Pool Marketing and Charity.
